quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“seditious”（煽动叛乱的）或词根“ser-”联想到“serious”（严肃的），误将其理解为“煽动叛乱的”或“严肃的”。
quiz_item.sentence: While cleaning out the attic, she made a **serendipitous** discovery—an old letter from her grandmother that revealed a family secret she’d never known.

option.definition: 偶然发现的；意外收获的
